name: The Queen's Journey
description:
This was an experimental, tile placement game that involved elemental reactions. The player walks around as a fairy queen on the forest-themed map in search of various portals that lead them closer to a witch who has taken her baby hostage. 

Currently, there is only 1 level that allows the player to get used to the various reactions and what the player can and cannot walk onto without dying. Future levels could have chests to pick up more abilities, 

This is still a working concept and was more, but I wanted to share it anyway :)

Date: June 2022
